To generate PDDL actions for the task "Make Cheese Sauce with Jalapeño Peppers," I will follow the provided steps and entity states to define the actions, parameters, preconditions, and effects.

### PDDL Actions

#### Step 1: Cut the Velveeta into tiny squares and set aside.

```pddl
(:action cut_velveeta
    :parameters (?p - player ?velveeta - cheese ?board - cutting_board)
    :precondition (and (at ?velveeta ?board) (whole ?velveeta))
    :effect (and (cubed ?velveeta) (not (whole ?velveeta)))
)
```

#### Step 2: Set the burner on a medium to low setting before adding the cheese product.

```pddl
(:action set_burner
    :parameters (?p - player ?knob - stove_knob)
    :precondition (and (off ?knob) (in_off_position ?knob))
    :effect (and (on ?knob) (in_medium_low_position ?knob) (not (off ?knob)))
)
```

#### Step 3: Wait until the Velveeta has melted, lower the heat somewhat, and add in the (Rotel) tomatoes.

```pddl
(:action melt_velveeta
    :parameters (?p - player ?velveeta - cheese ?pan - sauce_pan)
    :precondition (and (cubed ?velveeta) (at ?velveeta ?pan) (on ?pan ?stove))
    :effect (and (melted ?velveeta) (not (cubed ?velveeta)))
)
```

```pddl
(:action lower_heat
    :parameters (?p - player ?knob - stove_knob)
    :precondition (and (on ?knob) (in_medium_low_position ?knob))
    :effect (and (in_low_position ?knob) (not (in_medium_low_position ?knob)))
)
```

```pddl
(:action add_tomatoes
    :parameters (?p - player ?tomatoes - ingredient ?pan - sauce_pan)
    :precondition (and (melted ?velveeta) (at ?velveeta ?pan))
    :effect (and (in ?tomatoes ?pan))
)
```

#### Step 4: Add in the Jalapeno peppers, and black olives if desired.

```pddl
(:action add_jalapenos
    :parameters (?p - player ?peppers - ingredient ?pan - sauce_pan)
    :precondition (and (chopped ?peppers) (at ?peppers ?pan))
    :effect (and (in ?peppers ?pan))
)
```

```pddl
(:action add_black_olives
    :parameters (?p - player ?olives - ingredient ?pan - sauce_pan)
    :precondition (and (optional ?olives) (at ?olives ?pan))
    :effect (and (in ?olives ?pan))
)
```

Each action is designed to reflect the logical steps involved in making cheese sauce with jalapeño peppers, following the entity states and transitions provided.
